title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep when SWT.MULTI is selected. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: Upon choosing SWT.MULTI, a beep is heard. Subsequently, clicking on other buttons also triggers the bell sound.
EB: After selecting SWT.MULTI, the beep should not occur, ensuring a seamless user experience.
SR: Tested on Build F1 (20020521)Win2K. In the SWT example ControlExample, navigate to the Text tab, click on StylesSWT.SINGLE, and then switch back to StylesSWT.MULTI to observe the issue.
